item.title: Time to Move
item.description:
Floral clock, Lausanne, Switzerland

Dear Readers,

A warm welcome to FunderfulWorld.com!

Thank you very much for subscribing to theÂ FunderfulWorld blog and for continuing to read and comment on myÂ posts. My husband, B, has been successful in convincing me that it is time to move the blog to a new homeÂ and continue the journey from there.Â With his assistance,Â http://funderfulworld.wordpress.com/Â is now completely migrating toÂ http://funderfulworld.com/.

B has been instrumental in the design of the new home, and we think that it is now ready to launch!Â ðŸ™‚.

I have attempted to migrate all existing followers to the new websiteÂ but I am not sure if the migration has been perfect.

Therefore, I would like to request you to verify if you are subscribed toÂ http://funderfulworld.com/, and if not, please subscribe via e-mail, Facebook, TwitterÂ orÂ RSS feedÂ toÂ the new websiteÂ to continue receiving new posts.

I am very excited aboutÂ FunderfulWorldâ€™s new home! I hope toÂ quickly overcome any initial hiccups and continue smoothly on theÂ blogging journey.

aladybird

item.title: Itâ€™s a Funderful World on Facebook!
item.description:
Well, among other experiments with social media, I tried my hand at creating a Facebook page for this blog yesterday. Although I thought it would be a breeze, there were a couple of minor glitches.

All resolved in good time (tips from WordPress supportÂ for linking blogs with social media), and hey, It’s a Funderful World has a Facebook page now!

All new posts and other updates will also show up at:Â http://www.facebook.com/ItsAFunderfulWorld.

Open to ‘likes’, ‘comments’ and ‘shares’. Happy reading! ðŸ™‚
